snippet: Four executives of one of Chile’s largest financial groups, a tax auditor and a former government official were taken into custody in a case that has shaken the economic elite and the main opposition party.
abstract: Prosecutors in Chile file charges of tax fraud, bribery and money laundering against group that includes four executives with Penta, one of country's most prominent financial companies.
lead_paragraph: Four executives of one of Chile’s largest financial groups, a tax auditor and a former government official were taken into custody in a case that has shaken the economic elite and the main opposition party.

headline.main: Executives Are Jailed in Chile Finance Scandal
headline.print_headline: Executives Are Jailed in Chile Finance Scandal
